DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate the relative bioavailability of Divalproex Sodium 500 mg delayed release tablets under fasting conditions.
DOC.brief_title: To Demonstrate the Relative Bioavailability of Divalproex Sodium 500 mg Delayed Release Tablets Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal finding on physical exam, medical history, or clinical laboratory results on screening. Positive test results for HIV or hepatitis B or C. Treatment for drug or alcohol dependence.
